func.title: EliminatePlayer

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player to be eliminated.

param.name: remove_direct
param.desc: Eliminates the player as fast as possible, skipping the usual waiting time (in which the player is e.g. still counted for GetPlayerCount). There is nonetheless a delay of a few frames.

func.remark: In 9.0 OC the global function was discontinued, because it can be retrieved from a player directly with GetPlayer and Eliminate.
func.desc: Eliminates a player. The round counts as 'lost' for all eliminated players.

example.text: The first player is eliminated if he has no more flags.
